name: Untitled Snow Game
description:
HOW TO PLAY (PLEASE READ):

WASD - Move

SPACE (While standing on Ice) - Breaks Ice

SPACE (While standing on snow with Bumps) - Builds SnowMan

E (While Standing on Broken Ice) - Gets a Scrap

F (HOLD) - Build Mode

G (HOLD) - Remover Mode (Removes Builds)

OTHER (PLEASE READ):

1) You need 5 Scraps To Build One Wall

2) Removing walls Gives Your Scrap Back

3) Cant Move Across Water (Walk Around it)

4) Randomised Map

5) If you Start And you can seem to move just Restart the Game

6) This Game May Get Updates So Stay Tuned
